mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, product_no, member_id, review_content, review_score, review_image) values (review_seq.nextval, #{productNo}, #{memberId}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewImage})
mapper.select:
select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from review order by create_date desc) a
where rownum < 10;
